attributes.action: Make the 26th March 'NHS Day' in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS don't get enough recognition, and this would go someway towards getting the recognition they deserve.
attributes.background: After #clapforourcarers at 8pm on 26th March 2020, to thank our NHS and other Key Workers for the absolutely outstanding effort in fighting to get rid of Covid-19, March 26th should be made a national day, namely 'NHS Day'.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
